rules.scope: Each unique combination of [database].[subhive].[subsubhive].[section] defines a scope
rules.sequence: Starts at 0 and increments linearly per scoped group

module_discipline.purpose: Defines the discipline and rules for module versioning, integration, and merging. Ensures all child repos follow the same process.
rules: All child repos must follow these rules for module management
Module versioning must be consistent across all systems
Integration processes must follow established patterns

process_policy.purpose: Defines the policy for process creation and updates. No process is built unless the foundation conforms to doctrine and module structure.
rules: All child repos must follow this policy for process development
No process creation without doctrinal compliance
Foundation must conform to established module structure
All processes must be traceable via Barton numbering
